name: Abler's Ray
body:
See my try [Abler's Ray](https://2xv8j.github.io/AblersRay/Homepage.htm)

## About this project
This project is my visualization about how a website #AllInOneWebsite should like. This website is for searching anything on internet and that to free of cost. Even this project is under construction when it will launch it would help many.
***

## This website contains following tabs:

### Blog
This is the platform for our community to solve each others problems and at the same time service for everyone to post and share their stories that will help others to get entertained, be up-to-date for happenings around.

### Books
This site will provide a friend #BookFriend for everyone over internet they can download and preview billions of books.

### Contact and About
This site will help our friends to get connected to us in one more way we will provide assistance through text or through contact with our helpers.

### FMYH (For MY helpers)
This is the gift for those who would be working for our friends and us. This website would contain everything a employee needs in his office. Its a single all in one website for our helpers.

### Info Search
This site would search the internet for your needs and wants and show you the best results that too examining through special Artificial technology.

### Music
Our friends can download and listen songs. This website will contain songs in many languages.

### News
This site will keep you updated and also certificates for very regular readers it would arrange quizzes related to your interest. This would be just like the General Knowledge site.

### Coffee Time
This site will entertain you, it will contain Game Zone, Shows and many ways that you think will enter our friends.

### Images
This site is for downloading the picture in many size. This web page will contain high graphic images we can have accounts of our friends so that they can also post their pictures.

### Raynt
This is site for those that need a taxi or transportation, but this service would be there for freeðŸ˜Š. We can also help many to buy vehicles.

### Shop
This site is for shopping over internet at low price. It would contain everything form handmade to materials made by experts.

### TourIndia
This website is for adventurers and for travelers through this site they can plan their travel and tour.

### Emergency
This website would provide emergency services like ambulance, police, fire fighters, calls (Voice and video), and our assistant that would react according to situations.

***

## About Me
I am Siddharth
Nationality- Indian
I have been coding for this site from grade 9th. For one or two years I surfed internet and acquired much knowledge for web development.

## Authors and Contributors
This is Siddharth More(@2xv8j)

***
